item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: BAR

Your contact for the event is Dev, and her number is in her RSVP.

Try the Mashed Potato pizza and their brewed-on-site craft beers!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***

"Eric is also collecting donations for a cancer walk he's participating in June 8th. His friend Louise is having brain surgery number THREE June 10th, but the money collected will go to the Memorial Fund. Her family and friends are footing the $100,000 surgery bill. If you'd like to learn more about Louise, see: http://www.esthergolt....

If you'd like to learn more about the hospital where she will be having her surgery, and the charity fundraising event, see: http://mskcc.convio.n... "
item.how_to_find_us: There are three bar areas within BAR. (confused?) We'll be near the one featuring the pool table. Mingling is easier standing up, right Ben? Therefore we haven't reserved any tables. If you're sitting, and alone, try standing! :)
item.name: Monday Happy Hour at BAR
